**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 166 1.1 --- You tumble around your foes, expertly avoiding their reactions. Stride up to half your Speed and roll an [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34) check. Compare the result to the Reflex DC of each enemy whose reach you began in or enter during the movement, in sequence. **Critical Success** This movement doesn't trigger reactions from the enemy, and the enemy is [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) to you until the end of your turn
**Success** This movement doesn't trigger reactions from the enemy.
**Critical Failure** Your movement immediately stops when you enter the creature's reach; if you began in the creature's reach, you don't move.
name: Vexing Tumble
